message.content:
Here's a healthy meal plan for you for the next seven days, taking into account your restrictions. Feel free to adjust portion sizes according to your preferences or nutritional needs.

Day 1:
Breakfast: Gluten-free oatmeal with mixed berries and a drizzle of maple syrup
Lunch: Quinoa salad with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, and olive oil dressing
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with steamed broccoli and sweet potato mash
Snack: Rice cakes with avocado slices

Day 2:
Breakfast: Chia seed pudding made with coconut milk, topped with sliced banana and shredded coconut
Lunch: Lentil soup with a side of mixed greens salad and balsamic vinaigrette
Dinner: Baked salmon with lemon herb seasoning, served with roasted asparagus and brown rice
Snack: Fresh fruit salad

Day 3:
Breakfast: Green smoothie made with spinach, frozen mixed berries, banana, and unsweetened coconut milk
Lunch: Turkey and avocado lettuce wraps with a side of carrot sticks and hummus
Dinner: Stuffed bell peppers with quinoa, black beans, corn, and tomato sauce
Snack: Sliced cucumber with tzatziki sauce (dairy-free)

Day 4:
Breakfast: Gluten-free toast with avocado and cherry tomatoes
Lunch: Grilled vegetable quinoa salad with a lemon-tahini dressing
Dinner: Baked zucchini boats filled with ground turkey, onion, and marinara sauce
Snack: Rice cakes with sunflower seed butter and sliced apple

Day 5:
Breakfast: Overnight oats made with coconut milk, mixed berries, and a drizzle of maple syrup
Lunch: Greek salad with tomatoes, cucumber, olives, red onion, and dairy-free feta cheese
Dinner: Lemon herb baked chicken with steamed green beans and quinoa
Snack: Fresh fruit kebabs

Day 6:
Breakfast: Gluten-free pancakes made with almond flour, topped with sliced strawberries and a drizzle of maple syrup
Lunch: Tuna salad stuffed in bell peppers with a side of baby carrots and guacamole
Dinner: Turkey meatballs with marinara sauce, served over spaghetti squash
Snack: Celery sticks with dairy-free cream cheese

Day 7:
Breakfast: Green smoothie made with spinach, frozen mixed berries, banana, and unsweetened coconut milk
Lunch: Caprese salad with fresh basil, tomatoes, and dairy-free mozzarella cheese, served with a side of gluten-free crackers
Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with lemon herb seasoning, served with roasted asparagus and cauliflower rice
Snack: Fresh fruit salad

Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and adjust portion sizes according to your needs. Enjoy your meals!
